title: Weird smoke on champions on the website
body:
So I was playing some league when my friend sent me a message and said to look at TF, there is weird smoke and different cards. I went to the website and saw that, and some others had this. Anyone know what to make of this?

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/twistedfate/

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/cassiopeia/

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/zed/

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/lissandra/

replies.body:
On the TF's red car there is some writing on it. this writing is closest to the word shin. shin ----> Ao Shin. Its just speculation but it will make sense since it can coincide with the Japanese server that also coming out soon. 

I also there is a slight change to Jax's splash. there's a demon near the lamp.

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/jax/

What do you guys think?
err, that "demon" has been there since forever
here's the original splash and i see no demon:
It is referred to in this video, one that was posted in August. I guess it wasn't there forever, but it's kinda old. [link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BJ75ChovsJM)
I like the vid, thanks for it. Hmmmm this interesting still i hope its Ao Shin for preseason release

> It is referred to in this video, one that was posted in August. I guess it wasn't there forever, but it's kinda old. [link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BJ75ChovsJM)

the demon/darkin was there last year, removed, and is back now. it has been there before, but has only appeared again now
Ya what he said, I'm not as well researched on it as this guy

Now that it's been mentioned, there's actually quite a few champs with reverted splash arts. {{champion:84}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:67}}  {{champion:112}}  are those that I've found to be affected by that.

Also, a weird connection in regards to the fog: aside from {{champion:120}} , everyone with the foggy shroud shares a theme of betrayal or deceit in their lores. {{champion:69}} betrayed {{champion:15}} , {{champion:7}} is pretty shady and shit, {{champion:127}} betrayed her sisters, {{champion:4}} betrayed {{champion:104}} , {{champion:101}} betrayed his mortal form I guess, I dunno, {{champion:238}} betrayed those that trained him or whatever.
Just to clarify, Zed betrayed his master, and not blaming you or anything, but I don't think this reasoning would work because hec(and xerath?) don't match with it. There must be something else...

> Just to clarify, Zed betrayed his master, and not blaming you or anything, but I don't think this reasoning would work because hec(and xerath?) don't match with it. There must be something else...

Yeah, I was stretching with Xerath, but I did point out that Hecarim doesn't fit. If the theory that I've relayed here is correct, it means we're probably gonna see a really shitty lore rewrite for Hecarim. I didn't come up with it, I just heard it from a friend of a friend.

Post-shurima, Xerath's lore TOTALLY matches it. He convinced Azir to undergo the Ascension ritual and then backstabbed him to steal the power for himself, blowing up the city in the process.

Hec is the odd one out, true, but I wouldn't mind if he got a lore rework - right now his lore is literally "spooky horse from shadow isles." Him betraying somebody - leading cavalry to attack his own army at a crucial point or something - wouldn't go too amiss.
Well xerath's lore is just "he is powerful, but was mortal long ago"

> Well xerath's lore is just "he is powerful, but was mortal long ago"

[It's really more complicated than that.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/RdkEIREJ-short-stories-xerathunbound)
viktor's website splash reverted to pre-rework

Well at the moment only six champions are having this affect so it might be that hexakill in the twisted treeline might be coming soon
{{champion:4}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:101}}
hecarim
{{champion:120}}
Could they be  getting Harrowing skins?!

> Could they be  getting Harrowing skins?!

That is unlikely seeing that two of them already have one
They have already said what the three skin are going to be for the harrowing but there could be more.
Riot probably giving us a warning who is going to have there lore butchered.
its symbolic in how their backgrounds will soon be irrelevant
